title: the Schedule are delegated to Colm Brophy, Minister of State at the Department
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Justice, Home Affairs and Migration
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Justice, Home Affairs and Migration 

(Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No.2) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited justice home affair migration (delegation ministerial functions) (no.2) order 2025

title: the Schedule are delegated to Colm Brophy, Minister of State at the Department
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of 
the Minister for Justice, Home Affairs and Migration conferred on him by or 
under the provisions of the Immigration Act 2004 (No. 1 of 2004) specified in 
the Schedule are delegated to Colm Brophy, Minister of State at the Department 
of Justice, Home Affairs and Migration. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 13th June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 [253] 3
text_norm: 2 power (other power prosecute offence) duty minister justice home affair migration conferred provision immigration act 2004 (no 1 2004) specified schedule delegated colm brophy minister state department justice home affair migration notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 13th june 2025 253 3

title: the Schedule are delegated to Colm Brophy, Minister of State at the Department
heading: (a) Subsections (5), (6), (7), (8), (9) and (10) of section 6
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

(a) Subsections (5), (6), (7), (8), (9) and (10) of section 6 

(b) Subsection (5) of section 9 

(c) Subsections (1) and (2) of section 10 

(d) Section 17 

(e) Section 19, in so far as it relates to the prescribing of fees under 

that section 

(f) Section 20, in so far as it relates to the performance of the 

functions under the provisions specified in paragraphs (a) to (e) 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

10 June, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
